code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{FaHouse}from"react-icons/fa";import{FaPhoneVolume}from"react-icons/fa";import{RiAdminFill}from"react-icons/ri";import{FaScissors}from"react-icons/fa";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Navbar(){const[isAdmin,setIsAdmin]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{fetch("/admin/status").then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setIsAdmin(data.isAdmin)).catch(()=>setIsAdmin(false));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"".concat(process.env.PUBLIC_URL,"/assets/images/logo-annie.png"),alt:"Logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaHouse,{size:20})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/services",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaScissors,{size:20})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaPhoneVolume,{size:20})})," "]}),isAdmin?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/admin",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RiAdminFill,{size:20})," Admin Dashboard"]})}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/admin/login",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RiAdminFill,{size:20})," Admin Login"]})})]})})]})});}export default Navbar;
